definition: to congregate/to assemble/to mass/to gather together/to amass/to polymerize

sentences.english: Standard linings are supplied in either 2oz or 4oz machine washable FR polyester.
sentences.chinese: 提供标准的内胆是在任一盎司或阻燃聚酯安士机洗。

sentences.english: It will produce BOPP, polyester, metallised and other related films.
sentences.chinese: 这将会产生聚丙烯，聚酯，铝和其他有关的电影。

sentences.english: It is indicated that it is an interested problem on the use of polyester bottle in packing beer.
sentences.chinese: 指出研制灌装啤酒用聚酯瓶是近年的一个热门课题。

sentences.english: The mechanism and accomplishment method of PET bottle treated with plasma are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍等离子体处理聚酯瓶的机理及处理的方法。

sentences.english: Synthetic method of rosin acid modified terephthalic unsaturated polyester resin (TUPR) was studied.
sentences.chinese: 探讨了松香酸改性对苯型不饱和聚酯树脂的合成方法。

sentences.english: Polyesters exhibit better non-yellowing properties than epoxies, but not as good as aliphatic urethanes.
sentences.chinese: 聚酯的耐黄性优于环氧树脂，但弱于脂肪族聚氨酯。

sentences.english: The influences of cure accelerators to the synthesis of different polyesters are analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 分析了固化促进剂对不同配方聚酯合成的影响。

sentences.english: This paper discusses the preparation of two-component super polyester woodenware paint.
sentences.chinese: 本文论述了双组分聚酯木器漆的制备方法。

sentences.english: The development and application of HMLS polyester cord are described.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了高模量低收缩聚酯帘线的开发与应用情况。

sentences.english: The results show that the premixing process improved the polyester sizing efficiency.
sentences.chinese: 结果表明，预混合工艺能提高聚酯树脂的施胶效率。

sentences.english: The overall Chinese BOPET film industry is growing rapidly.
sentences.chinese: 中国双向拉伸聚酯薄膜行业发展迅速。

sentences.english: Thixotropic resin based on ortho-phthalic acid.
sentences.chinese: 触变型，邻苯型基体的不饱和聚酯树脂。

sentences.english: The polyester plasticizers are basically innocuity.
Polyesters are sometimes refereed to as oil-free alkyds.
sentences.chinese: 通常情况下，聚酯也叫无油醇酸。

sentences.english: Polyesters are less brittle than epoxies, but not as flexible or tough as urethanes.
sentences.chinese: 聚酯没有环氧树脂发脆，但也没有聚氨酯的坚韧性。

sentences.english: Spraying the quality, polyster on the surface of protective cases requirement.
sentences.chinese: 还可根据用户要求在扩套表面喷涂优质聚酯漆。
